author: krispopat
msg: A small change generating a valid uri for the id where the id of the widget fails the IRIValidator test or there is no id defined.  This does not fix the upload/update issue with generated ids.

author: mnuttall
msg: ARIES-512: JPA itests: use blueprint:comp/ to reference a datasource declared in blueprint from persistence.xml. Includes a fix to PersistenceContextManager by Tim Ward.
